metadata.title: CVE-2024-26461 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) 1.21.2 contains a memory leak vulnerability in/krb5/src/lib/gssapi/krb5/k5sealv3.c.

criterions.comment: krb5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
